summary: NASA is working towards a November 2018 launch date for the first test flight of its three related human space exploration programs: the Orion crew vehicle, the Space Launch System, and the Exploration Ground Systems. However, we found that all three programs face challenges and have little time or money set aside to address potential issues—likely delaying the launch date. We recommended that NASA report...
title: NASA Human Space Exploration: Delay Likely for First Exploration Mission
